item.title: Data description üìä
item.description: Where did we get the data? The data was acquired from openflights.org. This website hosts a handful of aerospace related datasets. We opted for the following datasets: airports.dat: The ID, city, country, and much more information (13 attributes) of 7698 airports all over the globe. Source: January 2017, DAFIF (Digital Aeronautical Flight Information File) and OurAirports routes.dat: The source and destination, and more (9 attributes) of 67663 flights connecting between airports.
